name: Finnish Summer Soup
author: Maryanne
summary: This soup should be made with fresh vegetables. Serve with a bread and cheese platter as they do in Finland. If you can't get fresh shelled green peas, use frozen tiny green peas.
ingredients: 6 cups green onions, cut into 3 inch lengths
1 ½ pounds fresh green beans, cut into 1-inch lengths
directions: Heat water to boiling in a medium pot; add potatoes
Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are tender, approximately 15 to 20 minutes
Add salt, pepper, butter, onions, carrots and green beans; simmer until tender then add peas
In a small bowl, stir together half-and-half and flour until smooth; stir into the simmering vegetables
Cook, stirring constantly until the soup is slightly thickened
